description: Test suite for the prompt_builder module, including helper functions and test cases for building prompts based on request data.

classes.name: PromptGenerateRequest
classes.description: Data class representing the prompt generation request with various configuration options.

classes.name: Orientation
classes.description: Enum representing different orientations for the prompt.

classes.name: Platform
classes.description: Enum representing different social media platforms.

classes.name: BrandVoice
classes.description: Class specifying tone and keywords for brand voice.

classes.name: StyleSettings
classes.description: Class describing styling preferences such as length and emojis.

methods.name: PromptGenerateRequest _make_request( *, orientation: Orientation = Orientation.post, platform: Platform = Platform.linkedin, brand_name: str = "Acme Coffee Co.", brief: str = "Launch a new seasonal latte.", include_hashtags: bool = True, emoji_level: int = 0, )
methods.description: Helper function to create a sample PromptGenerateRequest object with default or specified values.

ctags.name: _make_request
ctags.signature: ( *, orientation: Orientation = Orientation.post, platform: Platform = Platform.linkedin, brand_name: str = "Acme Coffee Co.", brief: str = "Launch a new seasonal latte.", include_hashtags: bool = True, emoji_level: int = 0, )
